citations.narrative:
There was fly strike ointment and sunscreen stored inside the feed bin for the pig. Storing chemicals with the feed can
cause contamination of feedstuffs and can lead to animal injury. Food fed to animals must be kept free from
contamination.
Corrected at the time of inspection

There are multiple wooden posts with rusted metal wire attached and with sharp points protruding outwards and sections
of older irrigation tubing in the sheep pasture. Sharp metal points and debris in enclosures can cause injury to the
animals. The facility must be kept clean and in good repair to protect the animals from injury. Remove these hazards from
the sheep pasture.
Correct by 9/16/21
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
JESSICA WATSON, Supervisory Animal Care SpecialistEnd Section

narrative:
3.129(a) 
   
Feeding. 
There was fly strike ointment and sunscreen stored inside the feed bin for the pig. Storing chemicals with the feed can 
cause contamination of feedstuffs and can lead to animal injury. Food fed to animals must be kept free from 
contamination. 
Corrected at the time of inspection 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
There are multiple wooden posts with rusted metal wire attached and with sharp points protruding outwards and sections 
of older irrigation tubing in the sheep pasture. Sharp metal points and debris in enclosures can cause injury to the 
animals. The facility must be kept clean and in good repair to protect the animals from injury. Remove these hazards from 
the sheep pasture. 
Correct by 9/16/21 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.

Additional Inspectors: 
JESSICA WATSON, Supervisory Animal Care SpecialistEnd Section
